original: paccayo. Abyākato hetuvippayutto dhammo akusalassa hetuvippayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: paccayaḥ abyākataḥ hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa hetu vippayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Akusalo hetuvippayutto dhammo akusalassa hetuvippayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
analyzed: akusalaḥ hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa hetu vippayuttassa dhammassa anantara paccayena

original: paccayo. Akusalo hetuvippayutto dhammo abyākatassa hetuvippayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: paccayaḥ akusalaḥ hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa hetu vippayuttassa dhammassa anantara paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Abyākato hetuvippayutto dhammo abyākatassa hetuvippayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
analyzed: abyākataḥ hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa hetu vippayuttassa dhammassa anantara paccayena

original: paccayo. Abyākato hetuvippayutto dhammo akusalassa hetuvippayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena

original: paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte tīṇi,
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe cattāri anantare cattāri samanantare cattāri sahajāte tīṇi

original: aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye cattāri, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane
analyzed: aññamaññe eka nissaye cattāri upanissaye cattāri purejāte pacchājāte āsevane

original: dve, kamme …pe… jhāne ekaṁ, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dve kamme pe jhāne eka sampayutte eka vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate cattāri saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā pañca na ārammaṇe pañca saṅkhitta

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe eka saṅkhitta

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe cattāri

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala attike pañhāvāraḥ evam

original: 4.2.4. Kusalattika, Hetusahetukaduka
analyzed: kusala ttika hetu sa hetuka duka

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam hetuñca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

analyzed: na adhipatiyā tīṇi na purejāte tīṇi na pacchājāte tīṇi na āsevane tīṇi na vipāke tīṇi na vippayutte tīṇi

analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa adhipati

original: 4.2.6. Kusalattika, Nahetusahetukaduka
analyzed: kusala ttika na hetu sa hetuka duka

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Kusalaṁ nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam na hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: akusalam na hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam na hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… navippayutte tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na adhipatiyā tīṇi pe na vippayutte tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Ārammaṇa
analyzed: ārammaṇa

original: Kusalo nahetu sahetuko dhammo kusalassa nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalaḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa na hetussa sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Akusalo nahetu sahetuko dhammo akusalassa nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: akusalaḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa na hetussa sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Abyākato nahetu sahetuko dhammo abyākatassa nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākataḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa na hetussa sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare pañca …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi,
analyzed: ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā satta anantare pañca pe sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi

original: upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi
analyzed: upanissaye nava āsevane tīṇi kamme pañca vipāke eka āhāre pe sampayutte tīṇi

original: …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pe a vigate tīṇi saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā nava na ārammaṇe nava saṅkhitta

original: Ārammaṇapaccayā nahetuyā nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayā na hetuyā nava

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe nava saṅkhitta

original: Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
analyzed: yathā kusala attike pañhāvāraḥ evam

original: 4.2.6.2. Nahetuahetukapada
analyzed: na hetu ahetuka pada

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Abyākataṁ nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam na hetum ahetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā ekaṁ …pe… novigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyāḥ ekam pe na u vigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo abyākatassa nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākataḥ na hetu ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa na hetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala attike pañhāvāraḥ evam

original: Hetugocchakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: hetu gocchakam niṭṭhita
